Question: Which of the following statements about the World Trade Organization is correct
A: It is a multilateral trading system that encompasses various fields of the world economy today
B: Its official operation marks the end of the "one superpower, many strong" pattern in the world economy
C: It was formed by the merger of organizations such as the European Union and the North American Free Trade Area
D: It is a tool for a few developed countries to control the world market

Question: In economics, it is often said that international trade is the "engine" of economic growth. The reason for saying this is because of international trade
A: It is a complex exchange activity
B: Can meet people's demand for diverse consumption
C: Being able to earn foreign exchange for a country
D: Being able to leverage a country's economic advantages

Question: Celadon is a famous traditional Chinese porcelain, known for its delicate texture, bright and smooth lines, dignified and simple shape, pure and colorful color. Exquisite celadon reflects Chinese culture
A: Seeking common ground while reserving differences and embracing diversity
B: With a long and rich history, I am the only one respected
C: Reflecting the times and abandoning tradition

Question: With the further development of the market economy, Chinese enterprises are paying more and more attention to the application and protection of intellectual property and trademarks. This phenomenon mainly reflects the characteristics of a market economy
Luo, from Duanzhou District, Zhaoqing City, Guangdong Province, used his credit card to maliciously overdraw 27800 yuan and was detained by the police in May 2010. This shows
A: Credit cards provide conditions for financial crimes in modern society
B: Credit cards must be held by individuals with high incomes
C: People must keep their promises and consciously maintain credit security
D: Credit cards can integrate deposit, withdrawal, loan, consumption, and settlement into one
